original_title: 眠らない男・ナポレオン　―愛と栄光の涯に―
overview: 2014 Takarazuka Revue Star Troupe production. This is the story of a hero, a man who rescued France from the chaos of revolution. His name was Napoléon Bonaparte. Having climbed to unparalleled heights after conquering Europe and becoming the first Emperor in the history of France, what was this hero seeking? Whom did he love? The truth behind this man who led such a turbulent life is about to unfold.
title: Napoléon, the Man Who Never Sleeps ~At the End of His Love and Glory~
